mapper.insert: insert into service (service_title, service_contents, service_secret, no, question_no) values (#{service_title}, #{service_contents}, #{service_secret}, (select no from member where email = #{email}), #{question_no})
mapper.select: select st, (select name from member where no = mno) as name, ss, sc, sr, sn from (select service_title as st, member.no as mno, service_secret as ss, service_contents as sc, service_reply as sr, service_no as sn from member join service on member.no = service.no) as mns
